task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 308°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to estimate the height of the building, but I cannot see the top, so I will look up to get a full view of the structure.

I can now see the top and bottom of the building; it appears to have about 8 floors, and assuming a standard floor height of 3 meters plus a slightly taller ground floor and roof structure, I estimate the total height to be around 25 meters.
